title: Here’s what Twitter’s upcoming edit button may look like
content:
Twitter users have been asking for an edit button for years, and it looks like their wish will be fulfilled pretty soon. Earlier this month, Twitter confirmed that it’s working on an edit button and that it will be made available to Twitter Blue subscribers in the coming months. The post Here’s what Twitter’s upcoming edit button may look like appeared first on xda-developers.
description: While Twitter hasn’t revealed much the edit button, we now have our first look at this upcoming feature. Read on to know more.
